A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Incredibly well directed\, well written\, and well acted. Riveting from start to finish. While there was some slowness in the middle\, it's because this Star Wars film was filled with so much substance. Not to mention\, the action is insanly good. A must see Star Wars film\, incredibly necessary for the trilogy and timeline. I'm going to watch this again\, and again!
